name: Forthleap - ALPHA
description:
Forthleap is an awesome 3D FPS Parkour game still in development by Jug Bug Games.

Default Controls:

Move: WASD

Interact: E

Sprint: SHIFT

Jump: SPACE

Crouch: CTRL

Slide: C

Exit / Pause Menu: ESC

Command Console:  `

Debug Console: TAB

Tutorial:

Picking up objects: To pick up objects, you have to face your camera on the object you want to pick up (pickable objects includes: cubes, chairs, and more) and then hold or press the INTERACT key (depending on your settings, default is hold).

Sprinting: To sprint, hold or press the SPRINT key (depending on your settings, default is hold).

Sliding: To slide, jump then if you hit the ground quickly press the SLIDE key.

Ledge Jump: To ledge jump, find a ledge then just spam the JUMP key (haha I don't even know how to explain this).
